img_above_text:
![Wukong Snowhill 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/23/Wukong_Snowhill_14.jpg)
He can also heave his blade around that will send his body spinning, attacking with two quick spinning slice attacks. Often times he'll end up holding the blade with his foot, and perform a final upward slash as he backflips, sending out another projectile slash.
img_below_text:
His one major attack will have him jump into the air and slam his blade into the ground, and then perform series of quick claw swipes in front of him with surprising reach, all while keeping close to the blade behind him -- meaning he can't really pivot if you dodge and attack from the sides.
![Wukong Snowhill 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/23/Wukong_Snowhill_14.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 12 from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Snowhill 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/23/Wukong_Snowhill_14.jpg)
He can also heave his blade around that will send his body spinning, attacking with two quick spinning slice attacks. Often times he'll end up holding the blade with his foot, and perform a final upward slash as he backflips, sending out another projectile slash."
            - Following Text: "His one major attack will have him jump into the air and slam his blade into the ground, and then perform series of quick claw swipes in front of him with surprising reach, all while keeping close to the blade behind him -- meaning he can't really pivot if you dodge and attack from the sides.
![Wukong Snowhill 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/23/Wukong_Snowhill_14.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showcasing a character known as the Macaque Chief in the midst of a dynamic combat move. The character is seen in a snowy environment, performing a spinning attack with his blade, which is consistent with the preceding text describing his combat style. The image serves to illustrate the Macaque Chief's agility and the visual impact of his attacks, enhancing the narrative of his fighting techniques and the challenges he poses to players.
